intro: Stenostomum biflorum, commonly known as the two-flowered stenostomum, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Commelinaceae. It is characterized by its small, herbaceous stature and is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. Stenostomum biflorum is often found in wetlands and marshy areas, where it thrives in moist, nutrient-rich soils.
